Filesystem                   Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
tmpfs                        1.6G  5.4M  1.6G   1% /run
/dev/mapper/ubuntu--vg-root  218G  192G   16G  93% /
tmpfs                        7.8G  2.3G  5.5G  30% /dev/shm
tmpfs                        5.0M  8.0K  5.0M   1% /run/lock

/dev/nvme0n1p2               471M  201M  246M  45% /boot
/dev/nvme0n1p1               511M  6.2M  505M   2% /boot/efi
tmpfs                        1.6G  284K  1.6G   1% /run/user/1000
